extendedInfo.description: â Turn your smartphone or Android device into a phone in the cloudâ Now with free, unlimited U.S. national calling and SMS. No credits or cash required!â Call, SMS, group chat, IM for FREE to any number worldwideâ Use it to contact anyone, even if they donât have the app Other cool stuff:â Get a real mobile number that follows you across devices (Look no SIM!)â Share pictures, location, emoticons, emoji and smiliesâ Call and text even when you don't have cell coverage (VoIP & IM)â Great for travelâ Save money by not paying for cell minutes for calls and texts WHAT'S MAKES YUILOP SPECIAL?â Let's you make free calls and SMS, even to friends and family who have not installed the appâ Most users report a higher quality connection than with other servicesâ We care about safety. yuilop is fully encrypted and don't give away your info to third partiesâ #1 App in Germany with over 5 million people, Best Mobile App 2013 in SpainHOW DOES IT WORK?Yuilop is an over-the-top (OTT), VoIP application, which means as long as you have a connection to the internet, through a data plan or WiFi, yuilop can send or receive your calls and SMS for free.When calling or texting someone who does not have yuilop outside the U.S., yuilop uses credits instead of cash. yuilop credits are easy to earn:â Join yuilopâ Invite a friend who joins yuilopâ Receive SMS to your yuilop number (yuilop.me)â Receive chat messages from other yuilop usersâ Participate in activities on the offer wall
